title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly define economic globalization.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how state membership in an international economic organization has influenced economic policies in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. Tasks B1 and B2 represent the description for each example/country.

For Task C, for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in Task B, explain why each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries would choose state membership in an international economic organization.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
